subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=xiāo,xuē,xuè,2nb=Mainland,3nb=Taiwan
|m_note=xiāo - vernacular (“to pare; to slice the ball”); xuē/xuè - literary
|c=soek3
|h=pfs=siok
|md=siók
|mn=siah
|w=4xiaq
|mc=y
|oc=2+3,1
|ma=Zh-xiao.ogg

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[pare]] with a [[knife]]; to [[peel]] with a knife; to [[scrape]] off the [[surface]]; to [[slice]]
# to [[divide]]; to [[split]]; to [[separate]]
# to [[weaken]]; to [[reduce]]; to [[cut down]]
# to [[delete]]; to [[remove]]; to [[cut out]]
# to [[rob]]; to [[expropriate]]; to [[plunder]]
# {{lb|zh|table tennis}} to [[slice]] (the [[ball]])
# {{lb|zh|ideophonic}} [[steep]] (as if [[sliced]]); [[precipitous]]; [[sheer]]
# {{lb|zh|ideophonic}} [[emaciated]]; [[scraggy]]; [[slender]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[書刀|writing knife]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[thin]] [[slip]]s of [[wood]] used for [[writing]]; [[letters]]
